headline: Cognizant may have renewed $1B deal with UnitedHealth, Mint says
summary: Cognizant’s (CTSH) president for the Americas region said while presenting at a fireside chat on Tuesday that the company had won a deal worth “approximately a billion dollars,” notes Mint’s Jas Bardia, who adds that Mint has learnt from people with knowledge of the matter that the statement indicates Cognizant might have renewed its partnership with UnitedHealth (UNH).
